      • run

        public void run()
        This thread spawn three new thread 1.Accept new connection 2.Deliver packet 3.Send packet
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
        覆盖:
        run 在类中 Process.BlockingProcess

      • causalSend

        protected void causalSend(byte[] msg,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long> delay,
                          Process.VectorClock c)
        This function handle causal multicast send
        参数:
        msg - message
        delay - Map from id to delay time
        c - the copy of clock to attach to the packet

        Override the unicast_receive to accommodate vector clock

        参数:
        dst - destination of receive
        msg - useless here
        抛出:
